price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߢߍߓߌߟߊߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߟߐ߲߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߐ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߛߎߋ߫ ߸ ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߘߏ߲߰ߘߌ߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߝߣߊ߫ ߟߐ߲߫
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَقۡدِمِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَـٔۡخِرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'nā al-mus'taqdimīna minkum walaqad ʿalim'nā al-mus'takhirīna
